description: ...ruined my screen resolution on launch, and subsequently proved un-playable.
Hard to see on the white screen. I wish there is away to put it into a window mode.

pretty fun, but not a lot of levels available and no display options present
also i miss the shift to slowdown (or at least the way it is implemented in rRootage)

Slow movement is available via the X key. A few options (e.g. windowed mode) are available at the command line, check the manual page.

This game represents STGs distilled down to bare minimum. Randomized enless levels are rare in the genre, haven't played other games w/ them. Difficulty in normal levels is not high, but pattern design is pretty neat.

Forcing the player to adapt endlessly would make for an interesting experience, but it's set back by lack of shot type options and ways of clearing bullets in instances where you get walled due to narrow shot spread.
